sourcesContent:
product-list works!

Type: {{ product.type }} - Price: {{ product.price }}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-product-list', templateUrl: './product-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./product-list.component.css'], }) export class ProductListComponent implements OnInit { //products: any[]; shippingCosts!: Observable<{ type: string; price: number }[]>; constructor(private http: HttpClient) {} ngOnInit() { this.getProducts(); this.http.get<{ type: string; price: number }[]>('/assets/products.json'); } getProducts() { this.http.get('assets/products.json').subscribe((data) => { console.log(data); }); } }
